# Required Packages

```{r libraries}

library(reshape2)
library(tidyverse)
library(glmnet)
library(survival)
library(futile.logger)
library(loose.rock)
library(brca.data)

#rmarkdown::render('template.Rmd')

library(parallel)
library(doMC)

# Load do package
devtools::load_all()

theme_set(theme_minimal())
.Last.value <- flog.layout(layout.format('[~l] ~m'))

.Last.value <- loose.rock::base.dir('./runcache')
.Last.value <- loose.rock::show.message(FALSE)
```

# Load data

Classification of Breast Invasive Carcinoma (BRCA) data from the Cancer Genome Atlas  (TCGA) ([TCGA](https://cancergenome.nih.gov/)).

```{r data}
library(brca.data)
data('fpkm.per.tissue', 'fpkm.per.tissue.barcode', 'clinical', package = 'brca.data')

# RNA-Seq data
# tumor tissue
xdata_tumor <- fpkm.per.tissue$primary.solid.tumor
xdata_tumor <- xdata_tumor[,-which(duplicated(getParticipantCode(colnames(fpkm.per.tissue$primary.solid.tumor))))] # removing duplicated samples
# normal tissue
set.seed(params$seed)
xdata_normal <- fpkm.per.tissue$solid.tissue.normal
xdata <- rbind(t(xdata_tumor),t(xdata_normal))
xdata <- xdata[, sample(seq(ncol(xdata)), 300)]
# response vector ('1', tumor; '0', normal)
ydata <- c(rep(1,dim(xdata_tumor)[2]),rep(0,dim(xdata_normal)[2]))

```


# Fit models

```{r fit}
fitted <- run.cache(network.cv.glmnet, 
                    xdata, Surv(ydata$time, ydata$status), 
                    network = 'correlation',
                    family = 'cox',
                    seed = params$seed)
```

# Results of Cross Validation

```{r results}
plot(fitted)
```

## Using lambda.min taken from cross validation

```{r, echo=FALSE}
top.coefs <- coef(fitted, s = 'lambda.min')
coefs.v <- as.vector(top.coefs)
names(coefs.v) <- rownames(top.coefs)
flog.info('Non-zero coefficients:', coefs.v[coefs.v != 0], capture = T)
```

### Hallmarks of Cancer

```{r, echo=FALSE}
names.df <- gene.names(names(coefs.v[coefs.v != 0]))
all.hallmarks <- hallmarks(names.df$external_gene_name)

all.hallmarks$hallmarks$gene.name <- rownames(all.hallmarks$hallmarks)

melt(all.hallmarks$hallmarks, 
                  id.vars = c('gene.name')) %>% filter(value > 0) %>%
  ggplot(aes(gene.name,variable, fill=value)) + 
    geom_raster() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) + 
    ggtitle('Hallmarks heatmap', subtitle = sprintf('Genes without hallmarks (%d): %s', length(all.hallmarks$no.hallmakrs), paste(all.hallmarks$no.hallmakrs, collapse = ', '))) + 
    xlab('External Gene Name') + ylab('')
```

### Survival curves and Log rank test

```{r, echo=FALSE}
draw.kaplan(as.vector(coefs.v), xdata, ydata, plot.title = 'Full dataset', legend.outside = F)
```
